basic.Peptide Name: W4 (single amino acid substitution of Bac034, which is a scrambled Variant of Bac2A)
basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC>50 µg/ml), Escherichia coli (MIC=6 µg/ml), Salmonella (MIC>50 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=50 µg/ml), Staphylococcus epidermidis (MIC=3 µg/ml).Yeast:Candida albicans (MIC=50 µg/ml).
